author: Simon Difford
description: Recipe supplied by Patrón Tequila, who say, "The Paseo Margarita's surprising mix of coconut and basil are a tribute to bartender Jacyara de Oliveira's journey from Brazil to Chicago. Patrón Silver brings together the best of both worlds, resulting in a sweet and herbal Margarita of the Year contender."
name: Paseo Margarita
recipeIngredient: 15 ml Sugar syrup 'simple' (1 sugar to 1 water, 48°Brix)

recipeInstructions.text: Rim the glass with rose salt
If using a wine goblet, strain onto fresh ice
Alternatively, if using a coupe, strain into the glass without ice
